atk-s0403a25:2_0: 251-253. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame upasampādetabbanti upajjhāyena hutvā upasampādetabbaṁ.
atk-s0403a25:2_1: Dutiye nissayo dātabboti ācariyena hutvā nissayo dātabbo. Tatiye sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti
atk-s0403a25:2_2: upajjhāyena hutvā sāmaṇero gahetabbo. Iti imāni tīṇipi suttāni paṭhamabodhiyaṁ khīṇāsavavasena
atk-s0403a25:4_1: veditabbāti. Sammato na pesetabboti pakatiyā sammato “gaccha bhattāni uddisāhī”ti na pesetabbo.
atk-s0403a25:5: 273-285.Sāṭiyaggāhāpakoti vassikasāṭikāya gāhāpako. Pattaggāhāpakoti “yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo”ti ettha vuttapattaggāhāpako.
atk-s0403a25:6_1: nigaṇṭhasāvako. Jaṭilakoti tāpaso. Paribbājakoti channaparibbājako. Māgaṇḍikādayopi
atk-s0403a25:6_2: titthiyā eva. Etesaṁ pana sīlesu paripūrakāritāya abhāvena sukkapakkho na gahito.
